title: KLOW-style support stack
summary: A synergistic, well-known style of combination: pairs complementary signals so the benefits stack without turning the whole plan into a high-risk pile-on. This is a concept model for how a curated stack reads: cohesive, minimal, and clickable.
cautions: Avoid doubling down on overlapping mechanisms without a reason.
If you are already using something that strongly overlaps (for example, another strong recovery blend), stacking may increase complexity without increasing signal.
